feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.6.0
entry.content:
NEW

You can now see all of your devices in one place on the root page and select "Details" for more info about that device.

What's Changed

  • Package updates and log cleanup by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/196
  • Multi view by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/199
  • Package Updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/201

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.5.0...v5.6.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Package updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/204
  • Bump actions/setup-node from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/208
  • More unit tests by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/209
  • Sonarqube fixes by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/210
  • Fix when device is unplugged by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/212
  • Update TailwindCSS by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/216

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.6.0...v5.6.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.7.0
entry.content:
NEW

  • Users can now click the "Last Updated" date to switch between 12 and 24 hour clocks.
  • Unplugged devices now has a cleaner look.
  • InfluxDB errors are now caught to allow other data to finish being written.
  • Input fields on the settings page no longer lose focus when typing.

What's Changed

  • Package updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/217
  • Dates in user locale by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/219
  • Handle unplugged (or otherwise unreachable) devices more gracefully. â€¦ by @JamesGDiaz in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/221
  • Catch InfluxDB Errors by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/223
  • Packages Updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/224
  • Fix input fields losing focus by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/225

New Contributors

  • @JamesGDiaz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.6.1...v5.7.0
